title: Chain Sync Info
body:
Hi,
I am new to Erigon and I have some questions. I am posting it here since the Discord invite link isn't working for me. 

I have a geth node running with dev chain. I would like to sync Erigon using this node. I tried using staticPeer but it doesn't show any sync progress. I hope someone can help me with this.

Thank you

Discord: send email to tg [at] torquem.ch 
Or pm in twitter

> Erigon logs plz

Thanks Alex for reverting. Please find the details below

I am initialising Erigon using genesis file. Here are the logs for it.

```
./build/bin/erigon init --datadir=dev ./genesis.json 

WARN[01-31|10:38:27.500] no log dir set, console logging only

```

Erigon startup command 
```
./build/bin/erigon --datadir=dev --private.api.addr=localhost:9090 --port=30304 --port=30302 --authrpc.port=8550  --http.port=8546  --nodiscover  --staticpeers=enode://2c8f6d4764c3aca75696e18aeef683932a2bfa0be1603adb54f30dfad8e5cf2372a9d6eeb0e5caffba1fca22e12878c450e6ef09434888f04c6a97b6f50c75d4@127.0.0.1:30301
```
